name: Panic At The Waiting Room
description:
*** If you can please try the desktop version as the web version is plagued with strange web only glitches I had no time to fix

This was a 3 way collab between me, Salaxio, and Cochu made in 3 hours for the Trijam.

Salaxio helped with Art, Animation and coming up with the concept

Cochu helped with Sound, Music and coming up with the title

I did the programming

Salaxio: https://twitter.com/salaxio_

 Cochu: https://www.youtube.com/@Cochu
